column2: select F.BANK_CODE, C.COMPANY_ABBR, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(F.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAYMENT_DATE , PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(F.PAYMENT_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') as PAYMENT_TIME , F.MOBILE_NO, F.PACKAGE_AMT, F.PACKAGE_VALUE, F.BILLING_SYSTEM from PMDB..PM_BATCH_PACKAGE_TOPUP F inner join PMDB..PM_PREPAID_LOAD_BATCH B on (F.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID) left join PMDB..PM_COMPANY C on (F.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID) where B.ORDER_ID = @order_id
